forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 43F. NW winds shifting to E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 20C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 69F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
